title: Dining at a Restaurant

stages.name: Arrival
stages.ai_opening: Good evening! Do you have a reservation?
stages.learning_tip: 'A table for two, please'처럼 인원수 말하기
suggested_responses: No, but do you have a table for two?
I called earlier for a reservation.

stages.name: Ordering
stages.learning_tip: 알레르기나 요청사항은 'I'm allergic to...' 또는 'Could you...'로
suggested_responses: Does this contain nuts? I'm allergic.
Could I get the sauce on the side?

stages.name: During the Meal
stages.learning_tip: 추가 요청은 'Could I have some more...'
suggested_responses: Could I have some more water?
Actually, I think there's a mistake with my order.

stages.name: Bill
stages.ai_prompt: Bring the check and process payment
stages.learning_tip: 'Check, please' 또는 'Can I have the bill?'로 계산 요청
suggested_responses: Can I have the check, please?
We'd like to split the bill.

completion_message: Great job completing the Dining at a Restaurant scenario!
